author: markekraus
body: since libcurl+ openssl + gssapi are no longer needed, we can remove these from the brew formula and the bootstraps. The brew formula can't be changed until we ship with .NET Core 2.1.

comments.author: vitorgalvao
comments.body:
Homebrew maintainer here. [We’ve removed the OpenSSL 1.0 formula because it’s EOL](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/pull/46876). [That broke the `powershell` cask](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/issues/78085#issuecomment-594682198) (which is what I assume you’re referring to).

[I was pointed to this issue](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/issues/78085#issuecomment-594682198) which [led to a PR to remove the dependency](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/pull/78101).

Is our understanding correct that we can remove the `openssl` dependency from the cask?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: openssl is only need for libmi, which is broken on macos.  It's okay to remove it.

title: Cleanup lbucrul and openssl installation from brew formula, mac build scripts, and bootstrap
